0.post_text: The #Ferrari 308 GTB marked a big change for the Prancing Horse family. Find out why: http://bit.ly/Legacy_308GTB #Ferrari70

comments.message: All Ferraris are beautiful but the 308 GTO's and GTB's were the most beautiful cars ever made back then and still look esquisit and beautiful today.

I had a 1985 308 GTsi quattrovalvole. I think this was the most beautiful Ferrari built with smooth sweeping contour lines and cooling vents. Also with the gated shift plate. This is why Ferrari decided to build the 458 and 488 with the same distinct lines. Ferrari forever.
My first Ferrari driving experience was a 1977 308GTB when I was 16 years old and I was hooked! I miss that car!! Would love to have one again!!!
Clearly one of the most beautiful modern sportscars in the world,  even moreso when clothed in GTO bodywork,  as mine is....
